alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Randolph (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 7:20PM CDT until August 09 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Randolph County in east central Alabama... Southeastern Cleburne County in east central Alabama... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 720 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fosters Cross Roads, or 7 miles north of Lake Wedowee, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ranburne, Woodland, Morrison Cross Roads, Fosters Cross Roads, Corinth, Trickem, Graham, Newell and Micaville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
